means: 意想不到的恩人，危难时提供帮助的救星

sentence.Network_en: The duty of a godmother is to make you learn your catechism.
sentence.Network_cn: 教母的职责是帮助你学好教义问答.

sentence.Network_en: The fairy godmother's magic charm turned Cinderella's rags into a beautiful gown.
sentence.Network_cn: 神仙教母的魔法使灰姑娘的破烂衣衫变成了一件漂亮的长外衣.

sentence.Network_en: The woman I regarded as my fairy godmother was Sybil. She was wonderful to me.
sentence.Network_cn: 被我视为贵人的女子叫西比尔。她待我好极了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 教_百度百科 ... 28. 教名[ Christian name] 29. 教母[ godmother] 30. 教派[ sect].
上周我去法国正式成为了他的干妈(Godmother),市长主持的仪式呢.力宁11月满3岁,非常漂亮非常有性格的一个小男人,会嘟嘟着嘴唇说 …
红裙子是代母 （godmother）Florette婆婆送给她的圣诞礼物。 白色坎肩也是，可是穿我身上了。
神仙教母（Godmother）：灰姑娘的保护神。在灰姑娘最失落、最需要帮助时，她用魔法使灰姑娘实现了参加宴会的愿望。

list.abs: enchantress（女性）附魔师；魔女fairy godmother仙女教母godmother教母

entry.def: A godmother is a female godparent.

means.word_mean: 1. any woman who serves as a sponsor for a child at baptism

auth_sentence.content: Laura was, indeed, godmother to my sister.
auth_sentence.res_content: Laura was, indeed, godmother to my sister.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Laura was, indeed, godmother to my sister.

auth_sentence.content: A fairy godmother scattering beads and feathers,...small...totems of love.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: A fairy godmother scattering beads and feathers,...small...totems of love.

auth_sentence.content: Humanitarianism also had a godmother, as Linda Polman reminds us.
auth_sentence.res_content: Humanitarianism also had a godmother, as Linda Polman reminds us.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Humanitarianism also had a godmother, as Linda Polman reminds us.

sentences.en: You’ll need a fairy godmother to get you out of your present difficulties.
sentences.cn: 你得靠一个大救星才能摆脱现在的困境。
